metadata.title: CVE-2023-23559 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
In rndis_query_oid in drivers/net/wireless/rndis_wlan.c in the Linux kernelthrough 6.1.5, there is an integer overflow in an addition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-23559` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.2.0-18.18
linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic-lpae - 6.2.0-18.18
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.2.0-18.18
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic-64k - 6.2.0-18.18
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-aws - 6.2.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-azure - 6.2.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-gcp - 6.2.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1001-ibm - 6.2.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1002.2
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-lowlatency-64k - 6.2.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-oracle - 6.2.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1004-raspi - 6.2.0-1003.3
linux-image-6.2.0-1004-raspi-nolpae - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required
